<Link id="l00369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="369"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For WNOHANG, we use waitid (which supports WNOWAIT) until the child process</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="371"><Highlight kind="normal">  siginfo&#95;t WaitIdInfo;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372"><Highlight kind="normal">  WaitIdInfo.si&#95;pid = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="373"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> WaitIdRetVal =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="374"><Highlight kind="normal">      waitid(P&#95;PID, pid, &amp;WaitIdInfo, WNOWAIT | WEXITED | options);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="375"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="376"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (WaitIdRetVal == -1 || WaitIdInfo.si&#95;pid == 0)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="377"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> WaitIdRetVal;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="378"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="379"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(WaitIdInfo.si&#95;pid == pid);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="380"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="381"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The child has already terminated, so a blocking wait on it is okay in the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="382"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// absence of indiscriminate &#96;wait&#96; calls from the current process (which</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="383"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// would cause the call here to fail with ECHILD).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="384"><Highlight kind="normal">  return ::wait4(pid, status, options &amp; ~WNOHANG, usage);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="385"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="386"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#endif</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="387"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="388"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/sys/processinfo">ProcessInfo</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/#a7defb51d8d6a2eba7a428d1a22f08bad">llvm::sys::Wait</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/sys/processinfo">ProcessInfo</a> &amp;PI,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="389"><Highlight kind="normal">                            std::optional&lt;unsigned&gt; SecondsToWait,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="390"><Highlight kind="normal">                            std::string &#42;ErrMsg,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="391"><Highlight kind="normal">                            std::optional&lt;ProcessStatistics&gt; &#42;ProcStat,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="392"><Highlight kind="normal">                            </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Polling) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="393"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">struct </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">sigaction Act, Old;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="394"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(PI.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/sys/processinfo/#addb475eb9bc55a3ed161d06a8a8927f7">Pid</a> &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;invalid pid to wait on, process not started?&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="395"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="396"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> WaitPidOptions = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="397"><Highlight kind="normal">  pid&#95;t ChildPid = PI.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/sys/processinfo/#addb475eb9bc55a3ed161d06a8a8927f7">Pid</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="398"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> WaitUntilTerminates = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="399"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!SecondsToWait) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="400"><Highlight kind="normal">    WaitUntilTerminates = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="401"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="402"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (&#42;SecondsToWait == 0)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="403"><Highlight kind="normal">      WaitPidOptions = WNOHANG;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00404" /><CodeLine lineNumber="404"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00405" /><CodeLine lineNumber="405"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Install a timeout handler.  The handler itself does nothing, but the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00406" /><CodeLine lineNumber="406"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// simple fact of having a handler at all causes the wait below to return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00407" /><CodeLine lineNumber="407"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// with EINTR, unlike if we used SIG&#95;IGN.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00408" /><CodeLine lineNumber="408"><Highlight kind="normal">    memset(&amp;Act, 0, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">sizeof</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(Act));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00409" /><CodeLine lineNumber="409"><Highlight kind="normal">    Act.sa&#95;handler = TimeOutHandler;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00410" /><CodeLine lineNumber="410"><Highlight kind="normal">    sigemptyset(&amp;Act.sa&#95;mask);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00411" /><CodeLine lineNumber="411"><Highlight kind="normal">    sigaction(SIGALRM, &amp;Act, &amp;Old);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00412" /><CodeLine lineNumber="412"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// FIXME The alarm signal may be delivered to another thread.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00413" /><CodeLine lineNumber="413"><Highlight kind="normal">    alarm(&#42;SecondsToWait);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00414" /><CodeLine lineNumber="414"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="415"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="416"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Parent process: Wait for the child process to terminate.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00417" /><CodeLine lineNumber="417"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/fs/#a5f126cc7b64d31cd709215b48656d83d">status</a> = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00418" /><CodeLine lineNumber="418"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/sys/processinfo">ProcessInfo</a> WaitResult;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="419"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#ifndef &#95;&#95;Fuchsia&#95;&#95;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="420"><Highlight kind="normal">  rusage <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/cseinfo-cpp/#a75f8a8519c2c9b30e7c06dc5e256fffa">Info</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="421"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ProcStat)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="422"><Highlight kind="normal">    ProcStat-&gt;reset();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="423"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="424"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">do</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="425"><Highlight kind="normal">    WaitResult.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/sys/processinfo/#addb475eb9bc55a3ed161d06a8a8927f7">Pid</a> = sys::wait4(ChildPid, &amp;status, WaitPidOptions, &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/cseinfo-cpp/#a75f8a8519c2c9b30e7c06dc5e256fffa">Info</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="426"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (WaitUntilTerminates &amp;&amp; WaitResult.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/sys/processinfo/#addb475eb9bc55a3ed161d06a8a8927f7">Pid</a> == -1 &amp;&amp; errno == EINTR);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="427"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#endif</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="428"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="429"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (WaitResult.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/sys/processinfo/#addb475eb9bc55a3ed161d06a8a8927f7">Pid</a> != PI.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/sys/processinfo/#addb475eb9bc55a3ed161d06a8a8927f7">Pid</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="430"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (WaitResult.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/sys/processinfo/#addb475eb9bc55a3ed161d06a8a8927f7">Pid</a> == 0) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="431"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Non-blocking wait.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="432"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> WaitResult;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="433"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="434"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (SecondsToWait &amp;&amp; errno == EINTR &amp;&amp; !Polling) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00435" /><CodeLine lineNumber="435"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Kill the child.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="436"><Highlight kind="normal">        kill(PI.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/sys/processinfo/#addb475eb9bc55a3ed161d06a8a8927f7">Pid</a>, SIGKILL);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="437"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="438"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Turn off the alarm and restore the signal handler</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="439"><Highlight kind="normal">        alarm(0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="440"><Highlight kind="normal">        sigaction(SIGALRM, &amp;Old, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="441"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="442"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Wait for child to die</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="443"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// FIXME This could grab some other child process out from another</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="444"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// waiting thread and then leave a zombie anyway.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="445"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (wait(&amp;status) != ChildPid)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="446"><Highlight kind="normal">          <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/lib/support/unix/unix-h/#a4a66e59cba198d78f4f5a80c1284a666">MakeErrMsg</a>(ErrMsg, </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Child timed out but wouldn&#39;t die&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="447"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="448"><Highlight kind="normal">          <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/lib/support/unix/unix-h/#a4a66e59cba198d78f4f5a80c1284a666">MakeErrMsg</a>(ErrMsg, </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Child timed out&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, 0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="449"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="450"><Highlight kind="normal">        WaitResult.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/sys/processinfo/#a492728a2b5ef64d0de116baeb2bcba56">ReturnCode</a> = -2; </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Timeout detected</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="451"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> WaitResult;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="452"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (errno != EINTR) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="453"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/lib/support/unix/unix-h/#a4a66e59cba198d78f4f5a80c1284a666">MakeErrMsg</a>(ErrMsg, </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Error waiting for child process&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="454"><Highlight kind="normal">        WaitResult.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/sys/processinfo/#a492728a2b5ef64d0de116baeb2bcba56">ReturnCode</a> = -1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="455"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> WaitResult;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="456"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00457" /><CodeLine lineNumber="457"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="458"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="459"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00460" /><CodeLine lineNumber="460"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We exited normally without timeout, so turn off the timer.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00461" /><CodeLine lineNumber="461"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (SecondsToWait &amp;&amp; !WaitUntilTerminates) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00463" /><CodeLine lineNumber="463"><Highlight kind="normal">    sigaction(SIGALRM, &amp;Old, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00464" /><CodeLine lineNumber="464"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00465" /><CodeLine lineNumber="465"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00466" /><CodeLine lineNumber="466"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#ifndef &#95;&#95;Fuchsia&#95;&#95;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00467" /><CodeLine lineNumber="467"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ProcStat) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00468" /><CodeLine lineNumber="468"><Highlight kind="normal">    std::chrono::microseconds UserT = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/#a1a420333641cfdaa22a032c78e92aa55">toDuration</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/cseinfo-cpp/#a75f8a8519c2c9b30e7c06dc5e256fffa">Info</a>.ru&#95;utime);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00470" /><CodeLine lineNumber="470"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t PeakMemory = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00471" /><CodeLine lineNumber="471"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#if !defined(&#95;&#95;HAIKU&#95;&#95;) &amp;&amp; !defined(&#95;&#95;MVS&#95;&#95;)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00472" /><CodeLine lineNumber="472"><Highlight kind="normal">    PeakMemory = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">uint64&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/cseinfo-cpp/#a75f8a8519c2c9b30e7c06dc5e256fffa">Info</a>.ru&#95;maxrss);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="475"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="476"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#endif</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="477"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="478"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Return the proper exit status. Detect error conditions</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="479"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// so we can return -1 for them and set ErrMsg informatively.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="480"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> result = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="481"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (WIFEXITED(status)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="482"><Highlight kind="normal">    result = WEXITSTATUS(status);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="483"><Highlight kind="normal">    WaitResult.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/sys/processinfo/#a492728a2b5ef64d0de116baeb2bcba56">ReturnCode</a> = result;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="484"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="485"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (result == 127) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="489"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> WaitResult;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="490"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="491"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (result == 126) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="492"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ErrMsg)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="494"><Highlight kind="normal">      WaitResult.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/sys/processinfo/#a492728a2b5ef64d0de116baeb2bcba56">ReturnCode</a> = -1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="495"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> WaitResult;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="496"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="497"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (WIFSIGNALED(status)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="498"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ErrMsg) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="499"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#42;ErrMsg = strsignal(WTERMSIG(status));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="500"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#ifdef WCOREDUMP</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="501"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (WCOREDUMP(status))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="502"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#42;ErrMsg += </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot; (core dumped)&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="503"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#endif</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="504"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00505" /><CodeLine lineNumber="505"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Return a special value to indicate that the process received an unhandled</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="506"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// signal during execution as opposed to failing to execute.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="507"><Highlight kind="normal">    WaitResult.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/sys/processinfo/#a492728a2b5ef64d0de116baeb2bcba56">ReturnCode</a> = -2;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00557" /><CodeLine lineNumber="557"><Highlight kind="normal">                                                  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;StringRef&gt;</a> Args) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00558" /><CodeLine lineNumber="558"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">long</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ArgMax = sysconf(&#95;SC&#95;ARG&#95;MAX);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00559" /><CodeLine lineNumber="559"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// POSIX requires that &#95;POSIX&#95;ARG&#95;MAX is 4096, which is the lowest possible</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00560" /><CodeLine lineNumber="560"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// value for ARG&#95;MAX on a POSIX compliant system.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00561" /><CodeLine lineNumber="561"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">long</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ArgMin = &#95;POSIX&#95;ARG&#95;MAX;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00562" /><CodeLine lineNumber="562"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00563" /><CodeLine lineNumber="563"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This the same baseline used by xargs.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00564" /><CodeLine lineNumber="564"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">long</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> EffectiveArgMax = 128 &#42; 1024;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00565" /><CodeLine lineNumber="565"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00566" /><CodeLine lineNumber="566"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (EffectiveArgMax &gt; ArgMax)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00567" /><CodeLine lineNumber="567"><Highlight kind="normal">    EffectiveArgMax = ArgMax;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00568" /><CodeLine lineNumber="568"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (EffectiveArgMax &lt; ArgMin)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00569" /><CodeLine lineNumber="569"><Highlight kind="normal">    EffectiveArgMax = ArgMin;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00570" /><CodeLine lineNumber="570"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00571" /><CodeLine lineNumber="571"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// System says no practical limit.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00572" /><CodeLine lineNumber="572"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ArgMax == -1)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00573" /><CodeLine lineNumber="573"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00574" /><CodeLine lineNumber="574"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00575" /><CodeLine lineNumber="575"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Conservatively account for space required by environment variables.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00576" /><CodeLine lineNumber="576"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">long</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> HalfArgMax = EffectiveArgMax / 2;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00577" /><CodeLine lineNumber="577"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00578" /><CodeLine lineNumber="578"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ArgLength = Program.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref/#a5db9240c74644c67759dd0f901fc3c7d">size</a>() + 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00579" /><CodeLine lineNumber="579"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Arg : Args) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00580" /><CodeLine lineNumber="580"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Ensure that we do not exceed the MAX&#95;ARG&#95;STRLEN constant on Linux, which</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00581" /><CodeLine lineNumber="581"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// does not have a constant unlike what the man pages would have you</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00582" /><CodeLine lineNumber="582"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// believe. Since this limit is pretty high, perform the check</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00583" /><CodeLine lineNumber="583"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// unconditionally rather than trying to be aggressive and limiting it to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00584" /><CodeLine lineNumber="584"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Linux only.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00585" /><CodeLine lineNumber="585"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Arg.size() &gt;= (32 &#42; 4096))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00586" /><CodeLine lineNumber="586"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="587"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00588" /><CodeLine lineNumber="588"><Highlight kind="normal">    ArgLength += Arg.size() + 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00589" /><CodeLine lineNumber="589"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ArgLength &gt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(HalfArgMax)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00590" /><CodeLine lineNumber="590"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00591" /><CodeLine lineNumber="591"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
